website_summaries.verdict: Integrated dual charging station and system storage with cooling fans and game dock slots in a space-saving design.
pros: Vertical charging stand optimizes space and can be used with PS4, PS4 Pro, and PS4 Slim systems
Two high-output controller chargers speed up overall charge time
Indicator lights show progress and full charge
Additional USB slots at the back of the station
cons: Stand turns off when the system is in sleep mode, which in turn may shut off controller charging as well

customer_reviews.title: False advertising?
customer_reviews.text: It says its for slim or pro or regular, but does not work for regular. Doesn't even fit the slot..
customer_reviews.author: justanotherfan09

customer_reviews.title: Fits Slim,  a little light weight on structure
customer_reviews.text: This stand was a little lighter in material weight than I would have liked. For an older gamer, this is fine. If you're buying for a younger or rowdier crew, consider a more durable one. I do like that everything can be stored together and decide the clutter. The stand fits the slim model but not very snugly. Not an issue unless you plan to travel with it in the stand. Overall, a good choice for a budget price. Four stars instead of five bc of the light weight structure.
customer_reviews.author: C.A.M. in U.S.A

customer_reviews.title: Easy peasy🖖
customer_reviews.text: I got it for my husband for his birthday and he loves it! I love that it can charge my controller to without connecting it to his ps4! Very simple! It was easy to figure out!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Castro

customer_reviews.title: I wish I got the newer model
customer_reviews.text: It’s okay not very sturdy, but worth the price. I can’t get the cooling fans to work.
customer_reviews.author: Khalil13

customer_reviews.title: Worth it! Very sturdy, quiet.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product for my new ps4 slim. I bought a new PlayStation bc of my original ps4’s noise level. It was very bad. I wanted to help reduce noise for my new ps4 slim, so I bought this cooling system. It is very sturdy, and the noise the fan makes is no where near as loud as my old ps4s running sound. It doesn’t really cool my PlayStation, but it definitely decreases dust build up. The game slots are nice to have as well. I don’t regret this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Keelyn O.

customer_reviews.title: Product performs as described
customer_reviews.text: I liked that the product didn’t need any assembly. Seems to do as it stated in keeping the PlayStation unit itself cool for hours upon hours of playing. My sons room use to get so hot between his television and I believe PlayStation getting hot after hours of play. Now when I walk into his room it doesn’t seem to feel as hot as before. Hopefully it will last for awhile, purchased for a reasonable price. Also I must say they have a few added perks with this, it cools your system, stores a few games, and charges your controllers all at once!
customer_reviews.author: Samuel Allen

customer_reviews.title: Purchased for Original PS4
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this item for the original PS4. The setup was very easy and the fan doesn't make much noise. I have noticed a difference when playing games such as The Witcher 3 but the PS4 will still kick on its own fan. Overall, I'm pleased with the product for its price. If you're looking for a more advanced cooling system, you may want to look at other models; but this was a good starting point for me.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: It does a good job holding the PS4 but the games are constantly falling. the grooves that the games are supposed to fit in do not do a very good job of holding the cases. Also, the USB ports on the front of it do not charge or allow sync with the controllers. I know that the docks are meant to charge the controllers but to sync a new controller I have to unplug the doc from the front of the PS4 to do so. Also I cannot power my external hard drive on it. Also, the little feet for the game holder are breaking already.
customer_reviews.author: Dormouse

customer_reviews.title: Hmm
customer_reviews.text: The area where the ganes stand on is not sturdy & moves or slides and the games are always slanted to the side but the charging docks are pretty sturdy & do the job. The stand where the PS4 sits on is good and sturdy. It’s worth the money on the control and PS4 side just the games side is what I wish was more sturdy but it’s way better than how we had it before
customer_reviews.author: Monica

customer_reviews.title: Compact and Clutter Free!
customer_reviews.text: Fits the PS4 beautifully! Reduces clutter. Space saver. Charges 2 controllers simultaneously. Push button fan on the side allows you to manually power on fan to cool device when you are playing games. Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Nakeeta Malone

customer_reviews.title: Everything about this is awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Pretty genius little stand. Fits my ps4 slim perfect. Has 3 usb ports i hook my 10ft controller cable to, i just leave it charging all the time. Nice organization for my games. Fans arent that loud and are strong enough to circulate air inside the ps4 and keep it much cooler. Plus you can charge your controllers i only use them to store my controller i have grips on my controller and i have to take it off to charge it on the dock. Nice feature though!
customer_reviews.author: AJ

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Works exactly as described
customer_reviews.text: Very satisfied with this product. Works as it should. It keeps my PS4 running smooth. The only feature that I wish it had is for there to be a way to Turn the fans off without having to physically get up and push the button. This would be a Little more convenient so when you’re done paying you don’t forget to turn them off. I’ve forgotten a few times and left the fan running over night. But overall very satisfied
customer_reviews.author: Onan

customer_reviews.title: Not very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: My boys needed something to keep their ps4 cool and working. While this seemed like a good idea the boys started complaining that the fan wouldn't work right and wasnt cooling their ps4. I then noticed this is not very sturdy at all. The remote control charger and storage for games is a nice idea addition though.
customer_reviews.author: Alexandria

customer_reviews.title: After 6 months...meh
customer_reviews.text: 6 month update: Not as happy as I originally was. The fans eventually get loud enough to hear over a game. The controller charges only if you get or perfectly seated in the cradle. Overall this is a vertical stand with an almost flush panel for game storage, fans that get louder the longer used and a controller organizer that charges when it feels like it. Fits the Pro just fine. The support legs for the disc cases are poorly designed but overall a good buy. I thoroughly cleaned my PS4 before setting in the stand and do not experience loud fans during extended gaming.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Kohlbeck

customer_reviews.title: Good buy.
customer_reviews.text: Product works and looks nice. My PS4 is still loud. It made it a little quieter not much.
customer_reviews.author: Derek & Jackie

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this PS4 stand for our 23 year old son's birthday and he loves it. He has a slim PS4 and it fits perfectly, it's relatively quiet, it doesn't take up much room, it has plenty of ports, keeps his PS4 cooled down and looks cool. He's pleased and it was inexpensive. Perfect gift for the gamer in your life!
customer_reviews.author: StarlaBathory

customer_reviews.title: Great for the system, not so much the controller and game cases
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for the game system. Getting the controllers in is a little difficult and you he games... you may as well just lay all the games on top of that. It’s not deep enough so they just wobble. If you go to grab one it knocks the others and if you get a used game from GameStop they put them in ps3 game cases not PS4 ones and ps3 ones fit even worse than the PS4 ones!
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: Great way to get organized!
customer_reviews.text: Got it through a flash sale. Best deal ever! Bought it for my son, 12. He's not very organized but with this he is. Keeps his PS4 upright, so it takes up a smaller footprint. Has slots for his games, in cases. Charges his remotes when not in use. And has an extra cooling fan! He loves it and so do I. No more finding his gaming stuff all over the place. It's all in one convenient area now.
customer_reviews.author: Jenn

customer_reviews.title: Save Up Space with this
customer_reviews.text: I was very surprised when I got this because I was a little skeptical on if it would work or not and it definitely works I have everything in it and it charges the controllers all the time and it is absolutely amazing I do not regret buying this because it definitely saves up space
customer_reviews.author: Ash Wag

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: It's horrible. I cant place my controller in the slot to charge while my ps4 is turned on. The slots so tight it pushes buttons on my controller and then its popping my disk out. Very frustrating. Why have a charging stand that only works while ps4 is on and you cant even put the controller on the slot. Not a brilliant concept. Not worth money at all.
customer_reviews.author: ashley

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: I like it!! Its alot more than what i expected
customer_reviews.author: Carlos

customer_reviews.title: My PS4 Pro HD Can't Fit In Charging Station That You Guys Send Me, the charging station is small
customer_reviews.text: I want this charging station for PS4 Pro HD, but it seems like is only for PS4 slim, cause the PS4 Pro HD can't fit in it. So if you guys can send me the right charging station for PS4 Pro, I will appreciate it.
customer_reviews.author: Jefferson K. Walker

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Like it there were 2 small pieces we werent sure what they were for and there wasnt really any instruction not that u really need any, but overall holds up the playstation and charges the controllers so so far so good😊
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Item
customer_reviews.text: Very quiet, charged controllers great, the foldout even makes a great rest for the PSVR HMD. I used a gel pad on the foldout just for extra protection for the headset and it couldn't be a more perfect setup.
customer_reviews.author: 123s

customer_reviews.title: Works fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: I like the product does offer the support for all playstation consoles. Does have that fan to allow the cooling as intended. Fits great and allows additional coverage to charge controllers.. only downfall is the disk storage is unremovable which takes up more space than intended. Overall awesome product!
customer_reviews.author: Luis Delgadillo

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Could use a slight tweaking.
customer_reviews.text: Pros: holds everything in one spot. Great storage and dual controller charging ports Cons: Biggest one is to get games to stand you have to slightly force them into spot. While not necessarily a bad thing. There is no kickstand or anything holding wing for holding game tray up so it is very flimsy. Last but no least. To get fan working have to plug in the 2 usb cord that is dangling in front. Minus a star for unslightly looking. Could have just ran a plug in out the back to get fans and charging docks to work.
customer_reviews.author: Wagz

customer_reviews.title: Great edition to my PS4 set up!
customer_reviews.text: My PS4 had been running a little warm, but this Kootek unit, and it's three cooling fans really seem to help. I dig it!
customer_reviews.author: Brian Vond

customer_reviews.title: Great gift!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 13 year old son as a gift. It was kind of for me to because I think organization. Well it was a win win!!! He loves it because he has more room for his Candy wrappers 😆 And I love it because his gaming pieces are all in one place!

customer_reviews.title: Game slots are useless and move the console.
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good product overall but the slots for games are useless. They fit very snug and you will move the PS4 if you take a game in or out.

customer_reviews.title: PlayStation stand a real space saver plus cooling fan
customer_reviews.text: This stand has completely met my expectations. It's fully functional and does everything the product description claimed it would. I have four starts for sturdiness just because it's all plastic, which wasn't a surprise to me, I knew it was gonna. Mine is not broken and I suspect will last for years to come with proper care.

Doesnt hold playstation well either be careful or it will fall over if bumped at all .

product_meta.title: Kootek Vertical Stand for PS4 Slim/Pro/Regular Playstation 4, Controller Charging Station with Cooling Fan Game Storage and Dual Charger Indicator USB Ports for DualShock 4 Wireless Controllers
feature_bullets: All-In-One: Vertical Stand ( Fit for ps4 slim/pro/regular ps4 console ) + 3 Cooling Fans+ 2 Controller Charging Stations+ 12 Games Storage+ 3 USB Ports+ 2 Charger Indicator
Universal Stand: Fit for ps4 slim/pro/regular ps4 console. Keep your console in a vertical position for saving space in your gaming table.
High-Efficiency Cooler: 3 cooling fans providing strong air circulation to disperse heat from the console, extend the operation life, no worry overheating after long hours of game playing.

Dual Charging Station: 2 high output controller chargers can speed up charging and reduce charging time. 2 indicator lights which showing charge status, fit for PS4 DualShock 4 Wireless Controllers. ( Note: Stand will stop working when console off/sleep mode. )
Games Holder: Features 12 games disk slot allows you to store your games which keep them in order and within reach. ( Please note game console, controller and games are not included. )

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars854 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
